Description_lang: Drive a spike into your target, dealing $s1 Physical damage and creating a chain link between you for $d. While the chain persists, $s2% of all damage dealt to the target is stored within it, up to a maximum of $s3.Moving away from your target will rip the chain out, dealing the stored amount as Shadow damage to all enemies within $s4 yds of them.
AuraDescription_lang: Moving away from the target will deal $w5 Shadow damage around it.
